DOC.brief_summary: To study the immediate effect of spinal manual therapy on pain perception in normal subjects
DOC.brief_title: the Hypoalgesic Effect of Spinal Manual Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: Is this effect only local or is it also noticed away from the stimulated area? How long does it last? Is there a dose/response phenomenon?
DOC.criteria: Healthy Students who volunteer from Murdoch University contraindication to spinal manual therapy
